Button.description: HTML tag to use for button (either 'a' or 'button')
Button.name: tag

Collapse.description: Whether the Collapse is open or not
Collapse.name: open

Dialog.description: Show a header on the dialog with this text
Dialog.name: message

Dialog.description: Text or html message for this dialog
Dialog.name: message

Dialog.description: Text to show on the confirmation button
Dialog.name: confirmText

Dialog.description: Text to show on the cancel  button
Dialog.name: cancelText

Dialog.description: Focus on confirm or cancel button when dialog opens
Dialog.name: focusOn

Dialog.description: Show this icon on left-side of dialog. It will use the color from type
Dialog.name: icon

Dialog.description: Fontawesome icon pack to use. By default the Icon component uses fas
Dialog.name: iconPack

Dialog.description: Show the cancel button. True for confirm()
Dialog.name: showCancel

Dialog.description: Type (color) to use on confirm button and icon
Dialog.name: type

Dialog.description: Animation to use when showing dialog
Dialog.name: animation
Dialog.values: Any transition name that ships with Svelte, or a custom function

Dialog.description: Props to pass to animation function
Dialog.name: animProps

Dialog.description: Props (attributes) to use to on prompt input element
Dialog.name: inputProps

Field.description: Type (color) of the field and help message. Also adds a matching icon.
Field.name: type

Field.description: Direct child components/elements of Field will be grouped horizontally
Field.name: grouped

Field.description: Allow grouped controls to cover multiple lines
Field.name: groupMultiline

Field.description: Alter the alignment of the field
Field.name: position

Input.description: Makes input full-width when inside a grouped or addon field
Input.name: expanded

Input.description: Show the password reveal toggle button
Input.name: passwordReveal

Input.description: Set input maxlength and show a counter
Input.name: maxlength

Input.description: Show the character counter when <code>maxlength<code> is set
Input.name: hasCounter

Input.description: Show this icon on left side of input
Input.name: icon

Input.description: Fontawesome icon pack to use. By default the Icon component uses fas
Input.name: iconPack

Notification.description: Whether the notification is visible or not
Notification.name: active

Notification.description: Display an X button that closes the notification
Notification.name: showClose

Notification.description: Automatically close the notification after duration. Doesn't apply when opening programmatically
Notification.name: autoClose

Notification.description: Duration notification will remain on screen
Notification.name: duration

Notification.description: Show icon on left-side of the notification. If set to true, icon will be determined from type property.
Notification.name: icon

Notification.description: Fontawesome icon pack to use. By default the Icon component uses fas
Notification.name: iconPack

Notification.description: Label for the close button, to be read by accessibility screenreaders
Notification.name: ariaCloseLabel

Notification.description: Text for notification, when used programmatically
Notification.name: message

Notification.description: Where the notification will show on the screen when used programmatically
Notification.name: position

Progress.description: Duration of progress change animation (in ms)
Progress.name: duration

Progress.description: Easing function to use for animation
Progress.name: cubicOut

Select.name: type
Select.values: is-white, is-black, is-light, is-dark, is-primary, is-info, is-success, is-warning, is-danger, and any other colors you've set in the $colors list on Sass

Select.description: Add the loading state to the Select
Select.name: loading

Select.description: Add the disabled state to the Select
Select.name: disabled

Snackbar.description: Text or html message for snackbar
Snackbar.name: message

Snackbar.description: Duration snackbar will remain on screen
Snackbar.name: duration

Snackbar.description: Where the snackbar will show on the screen
Snackbar.name: position

Snackbar.description: Background type (any of the Bulma has-background- classes will work)
Snackbar.name: background

Switch.description: Binding for whether the switch to "on" or not
Switch.name: checked

Switch.description: Whether switch is disabled or not
Switch.name: disabled

Tab.description: Icon to be shown on the left-side of the tab
Tab.name: icon

Tab.description: Fontawesome icon pack to use. By default the Icon component uses fas
Tab.name: iconPack

Tabs.description: Position of tabs list, horizontally. By default they're positioned to the left
Tabs.name: position

Tag.name: type
Tag.values: is-white, is-black, is-light, is-dark, is-primary, is-info, is-success, is-warning, is-danger, and any other colors you've set in the $colors list on Sass

Tag.description: Add close/delete button to the tag
Tag.name: closable

Tag.description: Close/delete button style equal to attached tags
Tag.name: attached

Tag.description: Adds ellipsis to not overflow the text
Tag.name: ellipsis

Tag.description: If should stop when using tab key
Tag.name: tabstop

Toast.description: Text or html message for toast
Toast.name: message

Toast.description: Duration toast will remain on screen
Toast.name: duration

Toast.description: Where the toast will show on the screen
Toast.name: position

Toast.description: Background type (any of the Bulma has-background- classes will work)
Toast.name: background

Tooltip.name: type
Tooltip.values: is-white, is-black, is-light, is-dark, is-primary, is-info, is-success, is-warning, is-danger, and any other colors you've set in the $colors list on Sass

Tooltip.description: Whether tooltip is active or not
Tooltip.name: active

Tooltip.description: Tooltip position in relation to the element
Tooltip.name: position

Tooltip.description: Tooltip will have fly animation, customizable
Tooltip.name: animate

Tooltip.description: Tooltip will be square (not rounded corners)
Tooltip.name: square

Tooltip.description: Tooltip slot will have a dashed underline
Tooltip.name: dashed

Tooltip.description: Tooltip multiline size (only works for multilined tooltips)
Tooltip.name: size

Tooltip.description: Tooltip will be fully rounded on left and right edges
Tooltip.name: rounded
